title-group.article-title: ‘Chemical stabilization of oils rich in long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acids during storage’ by F. Pop

permissions.copyright-statement: © The Author(s) 2012 Reprints and permissions: sagepub.co.uk/journalsPermissions.nav

abstract.p: At the request of the Managing Editor the following paper has been retracted: F. Pop. (2011). ‘Chemical stabilization of oils rich in long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acids during storage’, Food Science and Technology International 17: 111–117, DOI: 10.1177/1082013210368738.

body.p: This is due to excessive similarity to a previously published paper.

Serfert Y., Drusch S. and Schwarz K. (2009). ‘Chemical stabilisation of oils rich in long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acids during homogenisation, microencapsulation and storage’. Food Chemistry 113: 1106–1112.
